src_original: [ Cambridge MS f141b ---> ]  yathâhâryâkṣayamatisūtre pañcêmānîndriyāṇi /  katamāni pañca /  śraddhêndriyaṃ vīryêndriyaṃ smṛtîndriyaṃ samādhîndriyaṃ prajñêndriyam iti //  tatra katamā śraddhā /

saṃsārâvacarīṃ laukikīṃ samyagdṛṣṭiṃ śraddadhāti /  sa karmavipākapratiśaraṇo bhavati /  yad yat karma kariṣyāmi tasya tasya karmaṇaḥ phalavipākaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyāmîti /  sa jīvitahetor api pāpaṃ karma na karoti /
tgt_original: 於生死中行世正見信於業報，乃至失命終不作惡；

src_original: bodhisatvacārikām abhiśraddadhāti /  taccaryāpratipannaś cânyatra  [ Bendall ed p317 ---> ]  yāne spṛhāṃ nôtpādayati /
tgt_original: 信菩薩行不隨諸見，專求菩提不求餘乘，信解諸法同空無相無願之法；

src_original: paramârthanītârthaṃ gambhīrapratītyasamutpādanairātmyaniḥsatvanirjīvaniḥpudgalavyavahāraśūnyatānimittâpraṇihitalakṣaṇān sarvadharmān śrutvā śraddadhāti /  sarvadṛṣṭikṛtāni ca nânuśete sarvabuddhadharmān balavaiśāradyaprabhṛtīṃś ca śraddadhāti /
tgt_original: 信一切佛十力四無所畏十八不共法。

src_original: śraddhāya ca vigatakathaṃkathas tān buddhadharmān samudānayati /
tgt_original: 如是信已。 消除疑網修集佛法。
